snippet: Forecasts for first-quarter earnings have been scaled back, with profits now seen rising just 1.6 percent from a year ago, down from a 4.3 percent increase.
abstract: Stocks rise as earnings season is expected to show modest growth despite economic concerns.
lead_paragraph: Forecasts for first-quarter earnings have been scaled back, with profits now seen rising just 1.6 percent from a year ago, down from a 4.3 percent increase.

headline.seo: Shares Rise Despite Expectations of Only Modest Earnings Growth
headline.main: Shares Rise Despite Modest Expectations for Quarterly Earnings Growth
headline.print_headline: Shares Rise Despite Modest Expectations for Quarterly Earnings Growth
